程序包 org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power

类 PowerDatacenter

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEntity
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Datacenter
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power.PowerDatacenter
所有已实现的接口:
java.lang.Cloneable
直接已知子类:
PowerDatacenterNonPowerAware
public class PowerDatacenter
extends Datacenter
PowerDatacenter is a class that enables simulation of power-aware data centers.
If you are using any algorithms, policies or workload included in the power package please cite the following paper:
  • Anton Beloglazov, and Rajkumar Buyya, "Optimal Online Deterministic Algorithms and Adaptive Heuristics for Energy and Performance Efficient Dynamic Consolidation of Virtual Machines in Cloud Data Centers", Concurrency and Computation: Practice and Experience (CCPE), Volume 24, Issue 13, Pages: 1397-1420, John Wiley & Sons, Ltd, New York, USA, 2012
从以下版本开始:
CloudSim Toolkit 2.0

  • 字段概要

  • 构造器详细资料

    • PowerDatacenter

      public PowerDatacenter​(java.lang.String name, DatacenterCharacteristics characteristics, VmAllocationPolicy vmAllocationPolicy, java.util.List<Storage> storageList, double schedulingInterval) throws java.lang.Exception
      Instantiates a new PowerDatacenter.
      参数:
      name - the datacenter name
      characteristics - the datacenter characteristics
      schedulingInterval - the scheduling interval
      vmAllocationPolicy - the vm provisioner
      storageList - the storage list
      抛出:
      java.lang.Exception - the exception

  • 方法详细资料

    • updateCloudletProcessing

      protected void updateCloudletProcessing()
      从类复制的说明: Datacenter
      Updates processing of each cloudlet running in this Datacenter. It is necessary because Hosts and VirtualMachines are simple objects, not entities. So, they don't receive events and updating cloudlets inside them must be called from the outside.
      覆盖:
      updateCloudletProcessing 在类中 Datacenter

    • updateCloudetProcessingWithoutSchedulingFutureEvents

      protected double updateCloudetProcessingWithoutSchedulingFutureEvents()
      Update cloudet processing without scheduling future events.
      返回:
      the double
      另请参阅:
      updateCloudetProcessingWithoutSchedulingFutureEventsForce()

    • updateCloudetProcessingWithoutSchedulingFutureEventsForce

      protected double updateCloudetProcessingWithoutSchedulingFutureEventsForce()
      Update cloudet processing without scheduling future events.
      返回:
      expected time of completion of the next cloudlet in all VMs of all hosts or Double.MAX_VALUE if there is no future events expected in this host

    • processVmMigrate

      protected void processVmMigrate​(SimEvent ev, boolean ack)
      从类复制的说明: Datacenter
      Process the event for an User/Broker who wants to migrate a VM. This Datacenter will then send the status back to the User/Broker.
      覆盖:
      processVmMigrate 在类中 Datacenter
      参数:
      ev - information about the event just happened
      ack - indicates if the event's sender expects to receive an acknowledge message when the event finishes to be processed

    • processCloudletSubmit

      protected void processCloudletSubmit​(SimEvent ev, boolean ack)
      从类复制的说明: Datacenter
      Processes a Cloudlet submission.
      覆盖:
      processCloudletSubmit 在类中 Datacenter
      参数:
      ev - information about the event just happened
      ack - indicates if the event's sender expects to receive an acknowledge message when the event finishes to be processed
